definition: to establish/to found/to set up/to build/to construct
to build/to construct/to ram/to hit/Taiwan pr. [zhu2]

sentences.english: Shocking footage from China has captured the moment the outer wall of a high-rise building 'peels' off and crashes to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 令人震驚的視頻顯示中國高層建築的外層剝落的情景。

sentences.english: He has a comfortable apartment in a high-rise building in the business center of the city.
sentences.chinese: 他在市商業中心一幢高層建築裏有一套舒適的公寓。

sentences.english: American high-rise washers need specific training in regional standards.
sentences.chinese: 美國高層建築清潔工根據地方標準需要特殊的培訓。

sentences.english: Over the last decade, high-rise hybrid building was universally adopted.
sentences.chinese: 近十幾年來，我國高層建築普遍採用高層混合結構。

sentences.english: Lift-up fire engine is an important fire fighting equipment which can eradicate fire from high-rise buildings.
sentences.chinese: 登高消防車是撲滅高層建築火災的重要消防設備。

sentences.english: Analysis Method of Construction Process and Creep Shrinkage Effects in Mega-Frame Structure;
sentences.chinese: 施工過程和混凝土徐變對高層建築結構具有重要影響。

sentences.english: These conclusions provide the basis for cladding design of high-rise buildings.
sentences.chinese: 這些結論爲高層建築圍護結構的設計提供了參考。

sentences.english: As a long-term decorative topcoat on the surface of high buildings.
sentences.chinese: 作爲長效裝飾面漆，塗覆在高層建築的外表面。

sentences.english: Temperature-controlled concrete is used to build large-sized dykes and high buildings.
sentences.chinese: 大型水壩和高層建築工作需要採用溫控混凝土。

sentences.english: This article systematically introduces the skyscraper bioclimatic design approach.
sentences.chinese: 系統地介紹了高層建築的生物氣候學設計方法。

sentences.english: Now, it is a sea of highrises.
sentences.chinese: 它是一個高層建築大海。

sentences.english: Air infiltration energy consumption of tall building has become a serious problem in HVAC.
sentences.chinese: 高層建築滲風能耗已成爲暖通專業中不容忽視的問題。

sentences.english: At the same time, the introduction of green plants is also greatly improved the high-level Construction of micro-climate.
sentences.chinese: 同時綠色植物的引入也大大改善了高層建築的小氣候。

sentences.english: This paper deals with dynamic response of tall buildings due to the action of random wind loading.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究高層建築在隨機風荷作用下的動力響應。

sentences.english: One of the advantages of living on the top floor of a highrise building is that you can get a good view.
sentences.chinese: 住在高層建築頂樓的好處之一是能讓你欣賞到好風景。

definition: Guanzhong plain in Shaanxi, valley of the Wei River 渭河
banner/standard/variant of 標誌|标志[biao1 zhi4]

definition: to carry out large scale construction
Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region, abbr. 寧|宁[Ning2], capital Yinchuan 銀川|银川[Ying2 chuan1]
